column1: Here is my list of best books to learn both Scala and Functional Programming in 2023
column2: Dit is my-lys met beste-boek vir i leer Scala en functional-programming in 2023

column1: You can first start learning Scala programming concepts by starting with the first book on this list and then move to learn more useful functional programming concepts by using the second book on this list
column2:
Jy kan leer begin met boek-een van dit-lys
Dan jy leer e meer nut-funksie-program-konsep met boek-twee van dit-lys

column1: You should read at least these two books if you really want to master Scala because the second book will show you how you can use functional programming concepts to solve real-world problems, which are a very useful skill if you are looking for a Scala development job
column2:
E minimum a jy moet drie-dit-boek leer as jy want i mesteer Scala
Twee-boek wys hoe jy kan funksie-program-konsep gebruik vir i oplos real-world-probleem
Dit a kan e meer nut as jy soek werk e Scala development

column1: Many programmers think that just learning scala basics like case classes, traits, scala collection, and optional is enough to get a Scala programmer job, but that’s not true
column2:
Program-mens e meer i dink die i leer Scala-basis is genoeg vir i kry werk e Scala program
Maar i weet class en trait en collection en optional nie-is genoeg

column1: If you are serious about becoming a Scala developer, you must understand functional programming concepts like the map, reduce, fold, flatmap, monads, and lambda as well
column2:
Jy moet funksie-program-konsep weet as jy wil Scala-developer is
Dit is map en reduce en fold en flatmap en monad en lambda

column1: Just learning Scala basics won’t be enough to get a Scala programming job on Twitter, Linked In, or Intel
column2: E alleen a Scala-basis nie-is genoeg vir werk in Twitter of LinkedIn of Intel
